CustomField.description: Link to Fleet Central Project for this Opportunity
CustomField.formula:
IF(ISBLANK(Fleet_Central_Contract_Number__c ),
IF( Create_Project__c = TRUE, HYPERLINK("https://bdgl.sharepoint.com/sites/fc/Pages/ProjectLauncher.aspx?BDGLContract=" & Contract_Number__c , "Fleet Central Project", "_blank"), HYPERLINK("https://bdgl.sharepoint.com/sites/fc/Pages/Projects.aspx", "Fleet Central Project", "_blank")),
IF( Create_Project__c = TRUE, HYPERLINK("https://bdgl.sharepoint.com/sites/fc/Pages/ProjectLauncher.aspx?BDGLContract=" & Fleet_Central_Contract_Number__c , "Fleet Central Project", "_blank"), HYPERLINK("https://bdgl.sharepoint.com/sites/fc/Pages/Projects.aspx", "Fleet Central Project", "_blank"))
)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Link to Fleet Central Project for this Opportunity
CustomField.label: Fleet Central Project
